# <a name="insert-pictures-in-an-email-message-or-calendar-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="014d3-102">Umetanje slike u e-mail poruci ili kalendar događaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="014d3-102">Insert pictures in an email message or calendar event</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="014d3-103">Možete da umetnete slike, GIF ili clipart iz računara ili OneDrive kao umetnute slike u svoje poruke e-pošte za Outlook.com, događaje iz kalendara ili potpisa e-pošte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="014d3-103">You can insert photos, gifs, or clipart from your computer or OneDrive as inline images in your Outlook.com email messages, calendar events, or email signature.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="014d3-104">Oznaka početka pisanje poruke ili kreiranju događaj u kalendaru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="014d3-104">Begin composing a message or creating a calendar event.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="014d3-105">Izaberite ikonu za **Umetanje slike umetnute**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="014d3-105">Select the **Insert pictures inline** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="014d3-106">na dnu prozora za sastavljanje (pored ikone **Priloži**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="014d3-106">at the bottom of the compose window (next to the **Attach** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="014d3-107">).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="014d3-107"></span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="014d3-108">Odaberite sliku koju želite da umetnete i izaberite **Otvori**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="014d3-108">Choose the picture you want to insert and select **Open**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="014d3-109">Prevucite uglovima da promenite veličinu slike.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="014d3-109">Drag the corners to resize the image.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="014d3-110">Kliknite desnim tasterom miša na sliku da biste videli opcije oblikovanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="014d3-110">Right-click the image to see formatting options.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="014d3-111">Pročitajte više o tome kako da [priložite datoteke u Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8d7c1ea7-4e5f-44ce-bb6e-c5fcc92ba9ab?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="014d3-111">Read more about how to [attach files in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8d7c1ea7-4e5f-44ce-bb6e-c5fcc92ba9ab?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
